description: Grant permission to view a designated case.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Required element for GetCase to identify the requested case ID.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the case title.

nested_items.name: caseArn
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the case ARN.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides contents of the case description.

nested_items.name: caseStatus
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the case status. Options for statuses include Submitted | Detection and Analysis | Eradication, Containment and Recovery | Post-Incident Activities | Closed.

nested_items.name: engagementType
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the engagement type. Options for engagement type include Active Security Event | Investigations.

nested_items.name: reportedIncidentStartDate
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the customer provided incident start date.

nested_items.name: actualIncidentStartDate
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the actual incident start date as identified by data analysis during the investigation.

nested_items.name: impactedAwsRegions
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the impacted regions.

nested_items.name: threatActorIpAddresses
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of suspicious IP addresses associated with unauthorized activity.

nested_items.name: pendingAction
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides identifies the case is waiting on customer input.

nested_items.name: impactedAccounts
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of impacted accounts.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: watchers
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of Watchers added to the case.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the date the case was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the date a case was last modified.

nested_items.name: closureCode
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the summary code for why a case was closed.

nested_items.name: resolverType
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the current resolver types. Options include self-supported | AWS-supported.

nested_items.name: impactedServices
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of impacted services.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: caseAttachments
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides a list of current case attachments.

nested_items.name: closedDate
nested_items.description: Response element for GetCase that provides the date a specified case was closed.
